message: not sure if you guys even have a road map internally, but if you do, it would be interesting to hear what's coming.
I can say that we'll have a couple new features soon. Thinking of starting an optional newsletter for Convore updates...
Nah. Speak softly and carry a big ship, guys.
I would sign up for a newsletter or update group
@leah just start an "updates" group. I noticed the URL is available.
Anyone else thinking it's weird that this https://convore.com/convore/ isn't the official group where stuff like updates could be posted?

@EisFrei yes, but does convore want to become the URL police? While convore is obvious where do they draw the line? I have suggested that generic names (e.g cats, dogs, Niokn, Baseball, etc.) should be used for public groups but again how would convore police this?
@craigshipp I don't suggest taking the URL away. I don't suggest anything. I just find it strange that it isn't the very first group that was founded.
@EisFrei my guess is as convore becomes more mainstream the URL issue will keep coming up.
Perhaps private groups shouldn't get nice URLs like that...?

@mrjbq7 yep, if it's not already in there convore should add to the terms of service something like: "convore reserves the right to compel groups using simple, generac, URLs to be public groups. This is for the good of the community a large."
Hey guys does the 'follow user' feature exist and I cannot find it or there is not any? I would really like to be able to follow people with common interests with me.
@El_Rok nope and probably won't happen they talked about it, on following or more be like stalking not cool for people so probably not going to happen
